paper.title: A Dataset for the Vietnamese Banking System (2002-2021)
paper.abstract: This data article describes a dataset that consists of key statistics on the activities of 45 Vietnamese banks (e.g., deposits, loans, assets, and labor productivity), operated during the 2002-2021 period, yielding a total of 644 bank-year observations. This is the first systematic compilation of data on the splits of state vs. private ownership, foreign vs. domestic banks, commercial vs. policy banks, and listed vs. nonlisted banks. Consequently, this arrives at a unique set of variables and indicators that allow us to capture the development and performance of the Vietnamese banking sector over time along many different dimensions. This can play an important role for financial analysts, researchers, and educators in banking efficiency and performance, risk and profit/revenue management, machine learning, and other fields.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要描述了一个关于越南银行系统的数据集，虽然提到了风险管理和机器学习，但并未明确指出其核心技术或研究成果主要应用于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理中的任何一个特定领域。
